extension.description:
JUX Mega Menu

JUX Mega Menu is the most completed and easy to use Joomla menu module which allows you to display a ton of content in menu item including text, images, module and articles.

Most completed Mega Menu

  • JUX Mega Menu is fully responsive
  • Come with horizontal or vertical version
  • Mobile & Tablets compatible!
  • Available Joomla™ 3.x
  • Support for Pure CSS (non-JavaScript) menus

Easy to use

  • Works out of the box with most Joomla Templates
  • No coding required!

Highly Customizable

  • Includes 3 Themes and continue adding
  • Supports both Slide and Fade Effects for Sub Menus, or deactivate animations completely
  • Choose from Click or Hover Trigger
